item.description:
I'm teaching a series of introductory level Photoshop workshops for the BPC. I can sign up anyone from this group who is interested. This would be relevant to anyone looking to advance their digital photo editing skills.

Workshop fee is $36. Please contact me or email photoshop08@davidk.net if you are interested in attending.

Workshop Outline:

- Color and tonal adjustments in the editing workflow
- Understanding color temperature and white balance
- Removing color casts
- Tonal curves in film, monitors, and digital images
- How to interpret a photograph's histogram
- Dynamic range and clipping in digital images
- Enhancing image contrast without losing detail
- Enhancing shadow and highlight detail
- Advanced tonal adjustments with levels and curves
- Adjusting color saturation
- Touch-up tools and brushes

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Photoshop 102: Tone and Color
